name: Finish Project Proposal
description: Write and finalize the project proposal document

name: Prepare Presentation Slides
description: Create slides for the upcoming presentation

name: Review Code Changes
description: Review and provide feedback on the latest code changes

name: Schedule Team Meeting
description: Arrange a team meeting to discuss project updates

name: Test Application Performance
description: Conduct performance testing on the application

name: Create User Documentation
description: Write user documentation for the software product

name: Fix Bug in Login Module
description: Investigate and resolve the login module bug

name: Implement New Feature
description: Develop and integrate the new feature into the system

name: Perform Database Backup
description: Backup the database to ensure data safety

name: Create Marketing Campaign
description: Plan and execute a marketing campaign for the product launch
